charts.SystemPrompt:
The first original publication pertaining to Proteinpaint is https://www.cell.com/cancer-cell/fulltext/S1535-6108(20)30659-0?dgcid=raven_jbs_etoc_email. GenomePaint/Proteinpaint is an interactive visualization platform for whole-genome, whole-exome, transcriptome, and epigenomic data of tumor samples. Its design captures the inter-relatedness between DNA variations and RNA expression, supporting in-depth exploration of both individual cancer genomes and full cohorts. 
 Link to survivorship portal https://aacrjournals.org/cancerdiscovery/article/14/8/1403/746507. It shows datasets comprising demographic, diagnosis, treatment, outcome, and genomic data from survivors of childhood cancer. Put weblinks inside HTML <a> tag so that links are clickable

charts.SystemPrompt: A matrix plot displays mutation status and clinical variables across samples in a grid. The "geneNames" field should ONLY contain gene names. The "terms" field should ONLY contain clinical/dictionary variable names from the dataset (e.g. "diaggrp", "sex", "agedx", "genetic_race"). At least one of "geneNames" or "terms" must be provided. If the user specifies filters to restrict the sample set, include them in "simpleFilter" using the same format as other chart types.
